name: PRECISION FLIGHT CONTROLS PHILIPPINES, INC
about: Precision Flight Controls Philippines, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced flight simulation solutions, building on the global expertise of Precision Flight Controls. With over 33 years of experience in engineering and manufacturing high-fidelity flight simulators, we offer affordable, FAA-approved Advanced Aviation Training Devices (AATD) for general, commercial, and military aviation. Our simulators are designed to replicate various aircraft models, providing realistic and immersive training experiences. We are committed to delivering unparalleled training solutions, ensuring pilots can practice and perfect their skills in a safe and cost-effective environment. Our mission is to empower pilots and aviation professionals with the best training tools available.
